text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Honda was born in Kitakyushu on June 25, 1969. After graduating from Teikyo High School, he joined Japan Soccer League club Honda in 1988. In 1992, he moved to J1 League club Kashima Antlers. The club were champions of J1 League 4 times, J.League Cup 3 times and Emperor's Cup 2 times. He retired at the end of the 2006 season. He played 400 games and scored 6 goals in the league at both clubs. On October 24, 1995, Honda debuted for the Japan national team against Saudi Arabia. In 1996, he played in all matches including 1996 Asian Cup. In 1997, although he played at 1998 World Cup qualification, his opportunity to play decreased in the latter half.
